name: sandy the seahorse amigurumi
notes:
learn to crochet sandy the seahorse amigurumi with this free and easy pattern! this cute easy design is perfect for beginners and can be completed in just a few hours. 

use any yarn you like, create a small keychain sized seahorse with sport weight cotton yarn, or make a larger plush version using super bulky chenille yarn. the pattern includes a full video tutorial to guide you through making this adorable sea animal amigurumi!

link to written pattern:
https://www.mariskavos.nl/free-seahorse-crochet-pattern/

link to youtube video tutorial:
https://youtu.be/oqaslj4d1oa
